law.catch_line: Bases for organizational units for pilot programs.

text.section: The Personnel Steering Committee's recommendation of organizational units for the pilot personnel programs shall not affect more than fifteen percent (15%) of the permanent, full-time state employees employed as of July 15, 1994, except as provided in KRS 18A.450.

law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 456, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1994.
